resources.string: Defines the compression quality of the image in percent. The lower the quality, the smaller the file size. Recommended value: %d%%
Defines the length of the longest side of the image in pixels. The lower the image size, the smaller the file size. Recommended value: %d pixels

Defines the minimum change of lines in the image in compare to the last screenshot. A screenshot will be recorded as soon as the change in the image exceeds the amount. The lower the amount, the more screenshots will be taken. Recommended value: %d%%
Do you want delete all images?
Do you want delete all selected images?
Defines the minimum interval between screenshots in seconds. The shorter the interval, the more screenshots will be taken. Recommended value: %d seconds
This application needs a permission. In the next dialog click «START NOW».
Excludes this application from recording. This option is strongly recommended.
Automatically deletes records that are older than the specified days.
